name: Cashier Project (berkaykomurcugil)
description:
"Cashier Project" is a 7 level hyper-casual game that we swipe to the right or left according to whether the oncoming products are in CheckList or not.

We make money from each product by pushing the products on the list to the right and the products that are not on the list to the left. We try to finish the level with three stars according to the amount we earned.

***This game is created for educational purposes.
